description:
Welcome to Jewel Keepers: Easter Island â€“ an addictive match-three arcade action game with mind-blowing visuals and an engaging storyline! This game will keep you entertained for hours, as you travel across Easter Island and help to unveil its mysteries.

More than 20 levels spread all over Easter Island. Tons of different board shapes. Discover the intriguing story of the mysteries of Easter Island.
name: Jewel Keepers
